title: Support One Trick Duo For Season 9!

embed.description: LexyTheDeer / Silver 4 40LP / 293W 351L Win Ratio 45% / Thresh - 97W 117L Win Ratio 45%, Blitzcrank - 74W 71L Win Ratio 51%, Jarvan IV - 42W 36L Win Ratio 54%, Alistar - 18W 16L Win Ratio 53%, Twitch - 7W 14L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Hey all, since season 9 is starting in two days. I'm looking for a duo, who mains ADC or Jungle.

I'm a support main, who one tricks Thresh, peaked gold 2 in season 7. Going to try to push for Platinum of higher in season 9.

Requirements:
Working Microphone
Discord
English spoken
No toxic behaviour.
Ideally aggressive ADC or Jungler, and is able to play multiple characters.
Maturity.

My champion pool:
Thresh, Bliz, Tahm, Leona, Alistar, Janna, Pyke.

Fun Fact: In season 7, I held a 3.84:1 KDA on Thresh, with a 53% win rate of 490 games in ranked.

IGN: LexyTheDeer

Note: I won't be looking at the forum, as I work. So you will need to add me in game, have a good one. 

Good luck in the rift!
